pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, November 28, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Premier of Nunavut, the Honourable Joe Savikataaq.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the third floor foyer no later than 9:00 a.m.

10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the Fédération québécoise des municipalités, Jacques Demers.

Closed to media.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a roundtable discussion with leaders from the Federation of Canadian Municipalities.

Burgundy Room
Fairmont Château Laurier
1 Rideau street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2:00 p.m.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will be sworn in as the Member of Parliament for Papineau.

Closed to media.
